name: CHARACTER BINGO - Live Bingo & Slots!
description:
Play the only LIVE VIDEO BINGO game for FREE with your favorite characters!

It’s time to draw back the theatre curtains with Character Bingo! Get the experience of playing BINGO with your FRIENDS, anytime, anywhere! Download Character Bingo today!

Character Bingo Features:

• A HUGE selection of popular, amusing and downright unusual characters calling Bingo through LIVE VIDEO!
• FUN and INTERACTIVE Mini Games!
• BRAND NEW callers for all seasonal periods!
• Play CHAT GAMES like Trivia for FREE!
• Chat with other players & make friends from around the world!
• Connect with Facebook to play on different devices!

BINGO TO THE TOP
- BINGO your way to HUGE WINS while collecting achievements and becoming #1 on the LEADERBOARDS.

REAL CALLERS
- Play your favourite bingo patterns with FUN and THEATRICAL callers!

BOOM BINGO COMMUNITY
- Chat and play against players from around the world for FREE and receive gifts from friends!

PLAY MINI GAMES AS YOU BINGO
- DOUBLE your chances to win COLOSSAL JACKPOTS from a selection of ENTERTAINING MINI GAMES like Scratch Cards, Pull Tabs, Slots, Money Wheel, Rapid Bingo and Dice while you play Character Bingo!

PLAY GAMES IN CHAT
- Play TRIVIA and more for FREE in chat and win Boom Bucks!

CROSS-PLATFORM PLAY
- Connect on any platform with your account, so you can play on the go!

LIKE US: www.facebook.com/boomgamingcommunity
FOLLOW US: www.twitter.com/boomgamingnews
WATCH US: www.youtube.com/user/boomgamingvideos

DON’T MISS OUT
- Don’t miss some of our other FUN and EXCITING BINGO games, from Boom Bingo, Dog Bingo, Bingo Keno, Beach Bingo and more - get them NOW!

The games on this platform are intended for an adult audience and are for entertainment purposes only. The games do not offer “real money gambling” or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social casino gambling does not imply future success at real money gambling.
